synopsis.text:
III—along with his trusted associates, Goemon Ishikawa XIII, Fujiko Mine, and Daisuke Jigen—embarks on a thrilling adventure in modern-day France, the homeland of his grandfather and namesake, Arsène Lupin. Lupin sets his sights on an unprecedented heist: infiltrating Marco Polo, a clandestine dark-web marketplace teeming with criminals and fortunes to be seized. However, just as Lupin is about to make off with his latest prize, he finds himself cornered by the relentless Inspector Zenigata and his forces. Unbeknownst to Lupin, a new viral social media game called "Arrest Lupin III" has emerged, turning the tables on the world's most wanted thief.

As Lupin and his crew navigate the complexities of their escapades, they encounter formidable adversaries from both the past and present. With the latest technology at play and the ghosts of their pasts resurfacing, they must tread carefully to outsmart their pursuers. As Lupin's choices begin to catch up with him, Zenigata and his forces will stop at nothing to bring him down once and for all. Will Lupin III and his team outwit their enemies and secure their legendary heist, or will the game of "Arrest Lupin III" finally put an end to their daring escapades?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
